text.__SUMMARY__: Rhododendron myrtifolium (also Rhododendron kotschyi) is a species of Rhododendron. It's the broadleaf evergreen shrub common in the high mountain ranges of Eastern Europe and particularly in Bulgaria, Romania and Ukraine.
text.Synonyms:
Rhododendron ferrugineum, (Schott & Kotschy) Hayek, 1928.
Rhododendron kotschyi, Simonk., 1887.
